value:
I want to believe that Carlyle only
desired to protect my mother, but...
his actions speak for themselves.

I always intended to return to the
throne. I just had to become worthy
of it first.$k$pI am, if nothing else, my mother's
son...and a child of Jehanna.

A flower can't bloom unless its roots
run deep enough to sustain it. If only
I had understood that as a youth...

I need to turn my focus to the state.
There are so few leaders who grasp
the true value of coin...

Jehanna Hall lies in cinders, but we
will rebuild. We have more pressing
needs to take care of first, however...

I've heard only good things about
you. May your friendship with
$Nf continue on.

I promised my mother that I would
help destroy the Dark Stone. I will
defend Jehanna and her future!

I learned these techniques long ago,
in my youth. Useful, aren't they?

It seems I still have further to go...but
that just gives me something to focus
my efforts on!

I will become stronger, not only in
body, but also in mind. The people
deserve nothing less from a king.

The winds of change are howling. It's
time to finish what my mother started
and usher in a new era of prosperity!

It's hard to put into words, but...I've
finally stopped running, stopped
thinking only about myself.$k$pWhen Grado invaded, I didn't grasp
the threat. How could I have known
Jehanna Hall would be burned?$k$pBecause I was too slow and naive,
Carlyle's traitorous plot came to pass.
I lost my mother because of that.$k$pIt was probably too late, but I should
have returned immediately when I
learned who led Grado's army.$k$pDespite my failures as a son, the
queen never failed me. She taught me
what it means to rule with grace.$k$pI'm done wandering aimlessly. From
now on, I'm going to do everything in
my power to protect my people.
そらっ
こいつで…
ぐあっ…
しくじった…
I'm on a hot streak!
Bet on me.
I'm your best bet.
If it's a fight you want...
Just my luck...
ん？
What'll it be—heads or tails? I'm feeling pretty lucky today.
Who's there?! Oh, it's you. Don't sneak up on me like that.
Long ago, I grew tired of the formality of palace life, so I left. I felt I could never understand the people, sequestered in a castle.
I was a fool in my youth, yes, but I learned much over these ten years.
I know it doesn't sound like me, but…I will defend Jehanna and her allies.
I have learned much, but I've lost much more. Mother...
I've wagered everything on you. Let's win this thing.
I'm already there.
Hurry up, will ya?
Place your bets.
